name: Hardship (Groundhoggoth)
description:
This is a co-op story-game for one or more players: it can serve as a solo journaling experience, a table-top game for a group of six, or anything in between. All the players are the crew of a spaceship on a mission to intercept & board a target vessel: this book will help you determine the exact nature of the mission regarding the target. 

Using a 'flow chart'-like system, with plenty of prompts for creating your own content and the occasional die roll to randomise things, discover whether your crew solves the mystery, defeats the conspiracy and gets out alive with their goals complete... or will sinister forces see to it that there are no survivors left to tell the tale?
